TopicTitle: When opening the game the game freezes after opening the log file

Articles.Content:
When I try to open the game file, this is shown

[http://imgur.com/vI2I0mc](http://imgur.com/vI2I0mc)

In this view I cannot do anything at all.

I have Kerbal Engineer installed, but the problem was still there before I had it installed. 

I have to restart KSP multiple times (more than 5 times) to get it to go back to the normal view.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-18T01:24:13Z" title="06/18/2015 01:24  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 18, 2015</time> by Jongy**
Hmmm, a corrupt save can do that, which can happen if KSP has trouble writing files, it's a good idea to check the write permissions on the game folder and sub folders, and to start a new career.

> 
> Hmmm, a corrupt save can do that, which can happen if KSP has trouble writing files, it's a good idea to check the write permissions on the game folder and sub folders, and to start a new career.

I would prefer not to restart a new career save, how would I check the write permissions?

I'm not an expert on OSX unfortunately [**but you can find a lot of info here**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92228-Known-Issues-Self-Help), and if you upload your save to dropbox I could try loading it, it might fix it.

> 
> I'm not an expert on OSX unfortunately [**but you can find a lot of info here**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92228-Known-Issues-Self-Help), and if you upload your save to dropbox I could try loading it, it might fix it.

how do i upload something to a dropbox? and how do i find that dropbox?

- - - Updated - - -

Okay I figured it out, here is the link: [https://www.dropbox.com/sh/eis8q7uhnji8j9z/AADdpghUSt_a6VMk2pfx0RfSa?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/eis8q7uhnji8j9z/AADdpghUSt_a6VMk2pfx0RfSa?dl=0)
Okay it loaded and worked for me, so I saved it as [**"Jongy (career)"**](http://www.filedropper.com/jongycareer), I hope it works for you.

great thanks! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

great thanks! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) oh, and sorry for seeming so helpless, but what should I do with this file, should I put it in the my original save folder in the game file and load it up?
